name: Gunstar Super Heroes
overview: Your enemies intend to use a powerful crystal to resurrect the devastating God of Ruin and it's up to the Gunstar Heroes, Blue and Red to stop them! Developed by critically acclaimed developer, Treasure, this fast-paced action game will push your Game Boy Advance to the limits! -Blast your way through six intense levels and defeat an evil empire -Choose your hero: play as Red or Blue to combat powerful enemies and gigantic bosses -Amazing visuals create an unforgettable gaming experience
